dcterms:creator: Jort Gemmeke
Daniel Ellis
Dylan Freedman
Aren Jansen
dcterms:description: AudioSet, comprising approximately two million YouTube video audio clips of 10 seconds each, spans 527 classes. The dataset is used for audio classification tasks.
dcterms:title: AudioSet (AS-2M, AS-20K)

dcterms:creator: Karol J Piczak
dcterms:description: ESC-50 dataset consists of 2,000 audio clips, each five seconds long and distributed across 50 semantic classes. It is used for environmental sound classification.
dcterms:title: Environmental Sound Classification (ESC-50)

dcterms:creator: Pete Warden
dcterms:description: SPC-2 is a keyword-spotting dataset in speech recognition, comprising 35 specific speech commands with recordings for training, validation, and testing.
dcterms:title: Speech Commands V2 (SPC-2)
